General.Name: PGF Polska Grupa Fotowoltaiczna SA
General.Description: PGF Polska Grupa Fotowoltaiczna SA produces steel structures. It is also involved in the container production and repair, laser cutting, bending the sheets, rental and lease, truck service, and financial services businesses, as well as storage and files archiving business. The company was formerly known as Zastal S.A. The company was founded in 1945 and is based in Zielona Góra, Poland.

0.Name: Ms. Aneta  Niedziela
0.Title: Sec. of the Supervisory Board & Deputy Chairman of Supervisory Board
